section.section: There shall be a statewide primary election in every even-numbered year.

A primary election shall be held:
in the year in which the Governor is elected, on the last Tuesday in June; and
in the year in which the President of the United States is elected, on the first Tuesday in April.

text.section: In Baltimore City, there shall be a primary election for municipal offices on the first Tuesday in April in the year in which the President of the United States is elected.
